headline: Keysight Introduces AI Data Center Builder to Validate and Optimize Network Architecture and Host Design
summary: SANTA ROSA, Calif., April 01, 2025--Keysight Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: KEYS) introduces Keysight AI (KAI) Data Center Builder, an advanced software suite that emulates real-world workloads to evaluate how new algorithms, components, and protocols impact the performance of AI training. KAI Data Center Builder’s workload emulation capability integrates large language model (LLM) and other artificial intelligence (AI) model training workloads into the design and validation of AI infrastructure comp

headline: Keysight Validates Coherent's VCSEL Technology: Will it Aid the Stock?
summary: KEYS validates Coherent's next-generation vertical-cavity surface-emitting laser technology.

headline: Keysight Unveils Architecture for Scaling AI Data Centers
summary: SANTA ROSA, Calif., April 01, 2025--Keysight Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: KEYS) introduces the Keysight Artificial Intelligence (KAI) architecture, a portfolio of end-to-end solutions designed to help customers scale artificial intelligence (AI) processing capacity in data centers by validating AI cluster components using real-world AI workload emulation. Providing system-level interoperability, performance, and efficiency insights, KAI helps operators maximize system performance and pinpoint perfo
